title: Teams Advanced Administration
subtitle: Enterprise Collaboration Management
description: Master advanced Microsoft Teams administration and enterprise deployment
overview: This comprehensive 2-day course covers advanced Teams administration, including enterprise architecture design, phone system deployment, meeting solutions, and governance policies. Learn to manage complex Teams environments at scale with best practices for security, compliance, and user adoption.

learningObjectives.title: Design enterprise Teams architectures
learningObjectives.description: Design comprehensive Teams service architectures for enterprise environments

learningObjectives.title: Implement advanced calling solutions
learningObjectives.description: Deploy Teams Phone system with Direct Routing and Calling Plans

learningObjectives.title: Configure advanced meeting solutions
learningObjectives.description: Manage Teams Rooms, live events, and meeting policies

learningObjectives.title: Configure Teams governance policies
learningObjectives.description: Implement governance policies for teams, channels, and apps

learningObjectives.title: Manage Teams integration scenarios
learningObjectives.description: Configure integrations with third-party applications and services

learningObjectives.title: Monitor and optimize Teams performance
learningObjectives.description: Monitor Teams performance and implement optimization strategies

instructor.name: Yaïr Knijn
instructor.title: Principal Cloud Architect & Engineer
instructor.bio: Senior Teams administrator with extensive experience in enterprise collaboration platforms and Microsoft 365 ecosystems

modules.title: Enterprise Teams Architecture
modules.description: Designing comprehensive Teams service architectures for enterprise environments

modules.description: Implementing advanced calling solutions and phone system deployment

modules.title: Advanced Meeting Solutions
modules.description: Managing Teams Rooms, live events, and meeting configurations

modules.title: Governance & Management

handsOnLabs.title: Teams Architecture Design
handsOnLabs.description: Design and configure enterprise Teams architecture with network optimization

handsOnLabs.title: Phone System Deployment
handsOnLabs.description: Configure Teams Phone system with Direct Routing and call routing

handsOnLabs.title: Governance and Policies

personalStory.story: Microsoft 365 is more than just Office in the cloud. I've deployed M365 for thousands of users, integrated it with custom applications, and optimized collaboration workflows. This training shows you how to leverage M365's full potential based on real deployment experiences.
